question: Which country is to play host to the 2022 FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup?
explanation:
World football governing body FIFA has recently announced that the women’s youth tournaments for 2020 are cancelled.
As per FIFA, India has been awarded the rights to host the 2022 FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup and Costa Rica, the 2022 U-20 Women’s World Cup. Both the countries were due to host the 2020 editions of the respective tournaments.
